data.message:
GREETINGS MARSHALL HONEY!! HOW IS YOUR PRECIOUS HUMANITY THIS 'PASSING' DAY? YOU'RE A DJ NOW? HMM...MUAH HUGS AND KISSES XO OX XO OX OF COURSE I'LL VIEW YOU!! MARSHALL YOU'RE MY FAVORITE HUMAN!!!! HE HE HE I SEND YOU JOLLY SMILEYS =) =) =) TAKE SWELL CARE!! HAVE A REJOCING AND STUPENDOUS DAY!! 
FAREWELL BEAUTIFUL HUMAN' HE HE HE
ME THE "ONE" AND "ONLY" [[[SPECIAL]]] ~~**CLEMENTINA**~~
